msbt.message: If you don't mind, I'd love to see the other rooms, as well.
I confess, that room you have blocked off there It has piqued my curiosity.

My goodness, ! When it comes to interior design, I see you prefer the unfinished look. I kid! I kid! Still, for all the hard work you do around here, you seem to have fallen asleep on this job. Not that I'm judging. We all need to hit the snooze button every now and again.

My dear, a note. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You see the facing the wall thereIt may surprise you to learn that it's meant to go the other way around.<20_3 arg="6" />Don't get me wrong,<20_3 arg="3" /> I simply adore the way you think outside the box. You do YOU, darling.
My oh my! This room has no chair, no bed, nowellanything.EhI mean, good for you, darling!They say simplicity is the ultimate sophistication. Which makes you the most sophisticated person I know!

This room is so well put together! I just LOVE how it has all the essentials. Not a thing missing. You know, people often forget the importance of a good cabinet. They hold much more than you'd think!
Why, your walls are completely bare! You know, a nice painting or three would give this room some pizazz!
Oh my! This furniture! Most of it has never even appeared in a store before. What an exquisite collection!
What a splendid space you have! All the furniture in here is simply gorgeous! You clearly have a taste for the finer things in life. And, darling, I approve!
My my, there's SO much free space in this room. Whatever will you do with it all? I know! You could take up yoga or fencing! Bowling, perhaps?
Does this room double as an obstacle course, my dear?What I mean to say is, you've done an admirable job fitting so very many things into this one space.
You DO have a way with interior design, darling. I just want to relax and take it all in. Surely you won't mind if I borrow a design idea or two while I'm at it.
I hope you don't mind me being here. I'm such a busybody! I just can't help looking around.
My, my, my! Just as I thought... It's so very YOU, . Very tasteful, indeed.
